CVortikid.cpp

00001 #include "../../../sdl/sound/CSound.h"
00002 
00003 #include "CVortiKid.h"
00004 #include "../../../misc.h"
00005 
00006 // Baby Vorticon (the superfast little blue creatures that knock you down)
00007 // (ep 2 & 3)
00008 
00009 #define BABY_WALK_SPEED         77
00010 
00011 #define BABY_WALK_ANIM_RATE     6
00012 
00013 #define BABY_WALK_LEFT_FRAME    48
00014 #define BABY_WALK_RIGHT_FRAME   52
00015 #define BABY_FRY_FRAME          56
00016 #define BABY_DEAD_FRAME         57
00017 
00018 #define BABY_JUMP_PROB   100
00019 #define BABY_BOUNCE_PROB  200
00020 
00021 #define BABY_FRY_TIME           20
00022 #define BABY_DIE_INERTIA        20
00023 
00024 enum baby_jump_style{
00025 BABY_JUMP_BIG, BABY_JUMP_SMALL
00026 };
00027 
00028 CVortikid::CVortikid( CMap *p_map, std::vector<CPlayer> &mp_vec_Player,
00029   Uint32 x, Uint32 y ) :
00030 CObject(p_map, x, y, OBJ_BABY),
00031 m_Player(mp_vec_Player)
00032 {
00033  bool ep3;
00034  state = BABY_RUN;
00035  dir = rand() & 1 ? LEFT : RIGHT;
00036  walkframe = 0;
00037  walktimer = 0;
00038  canbezapped = true;
00039 
00040  // babies are in ep2 & ep3, but frameset starts one index prior in ep3
00041  if (g_pBehaviorEngine->getEpisode()==3) ep3 = true; else ep3 = false;
00042  sprite = BABY_WALK_RIGHT_FRAME - ep3;
00043 }
00044 
00045 void CVortikid::process()
00046 {
00047  bool ep3;
00048 
00049  // babies are in ep2 & ep3, but frameset starts one index prior in ep3
00050  if (g_pBehaviorEngine->getEpisode()==3) ep3 = true; else ep3 = false;
00051 
00052  // jumping
00053  if(blockedd && state == BABY_RUN)
00054  {
00055   if(getProbability(BABY_JUMP_PROB))
00056    baby_jump(BABY_JUMP_SMALL);
00057  }
00058 
00059  // got hit?
00060  if (HealthPoints <= 0 && state != BABY_DYING)
00061  {
00062   dietimer = 0;
00063   state = BABY_DYING;
00064   dying = true;
00065   sprite = BABY_FRY_FRAME - ep3;
00066   if (onscreen && !g_pSound->isPlaying(SOUND_VORT_DIE))
00067    g_pSound->playStereofromCoord(SOUND_VORT_DIE, PLAY_NOW, scrx);
00068 
00069   if (dir == RIGHT)
00070    xinertia = BABY_DIE_INERTIA;
00071   else
00072    xinertia = -BABY_DIE_INERTIA;
00073  }
00074 
00075  // touched player
00076  if (touchPlayer && state!=BABY_DYING && !m_Player[touchedBy].pfrozentime)
00077  {
00078   m_Player[touchedBy].pdir = m_Player[touchedBy].pshowdir = dir;
00079   m_Player[touchedBy].freeze();
00080  }
00081 
00082  switch(state)
00083  {
00084  case BABY_DYING:
00085   if ((xinertia < 0 && blockedl) ||\
00086     (xinertia > 0 && blockedr))
00087   {
00088    xinertia = 0;
00089   }
00090 
00091   if (xdectimer >= 10)
00092   {
00093    if (xinertia < 0)
00094    {
00095     xinertia++;
00096    }
00097    else if (xinertia > 0)
00098    {
00099     xinertia--;
00100    }
00101 
00102    if (xinertia == 0 && yinertia == 0 &&
00103     sprite==(unsigned int)(BABY_DEAD_FRAME-ep3))
00104    {
00105     dead = true;
00106     xinertia = 0;
00107    }
00108    xdectimer = 0;
00109   }
00110   else xdectimer++;
00111 
00112   if (dietimer > BABY_FRY_TIME)
00113   {
00114    sprite = BABY_DEAD_FRAME-ep3;
00115   }
00116   else dietimer++;
00117   break;
00118  case BABY_RUN:
00119   // run in appropriate direction
00120   if (dir==RIGHT)
00121   { // running right
00122    sprite = BABY_WALK_RIGHT_FRAME + walkframe - ep3;
00123    if (blockedr)
00124    {
00125     dir = LEFT;
00126     if(getProbability(BABY_BOUNCE_PROB)) baby_jump(BABY_JUMP_BIG);
00127    }
00128    else
00129    {
00130     xinertia = BABY_WALK_SPEED;
00131    }
00132   }
00133   else
00134   { // running left
00135    sprite = BABY_WALK_LEFT_FRAME + walkframe - ep3;
00136    if (blockedl)
00137    {
00138     dir = RIGHT;
00139     if (getProbability(BABY_BOUNCE_PROB)) baby_jump(BABY_JUMP_BIG);
00140    }
00141    else
00142    {
00143     xinertia = -BABY_WALK_SPEED;
00144    }
00145   }
00146 
00147   // run animation
00148   if (walktimer > BABY_WALK_ANIM_RATE)
00149   {
00150    walkframe++;
00151    if (walkframe > 3) walkframe = 0;
00152    walktimer = 0;
00153   } else walktimer++;
00154   break;
00155  default: break;
00156  }
00157 }
00158 
00159 const int BABY_BIGJUMP = 200;
00160 const int BABY_SMALLJUMP = 80;
00161 
00162 void CVortikid::baby_jump(int big)
00163 {
00164  if ((rand()&2)==0) big = 1-big;
00165  yinertia =  (big==BABY_JUMP_BIG) ? -BABY_BIGJUMP : -BABY_SMALLJUMP ;
00166 
00167  jumpdectimer = 0;
00168 }
